content: {"name": "Penn Asian Evergreen Community Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Our team is dedicated to ensuring that no senior goes hungry. You can request a meal by contacting Penn Asian Senior Services at (215) 572-1234 ext. 211 or by filling out our contact form https://passi.us/contact/", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6926 Old York Road", "address_2": "Unit 2 (left building from parking lot)", "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19126", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.058769, "longitude": -75.1397145}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 572-1234", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "SNAP assistance available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Helps with income, rent, utility and food stamps"}]}
